amendment.description: An amendment numbered 23 printed in Part B of House Report 116-16 to remove the granting of subpoena authority to the Director of the Office of Government Ethics.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hice (GA) amendment (A022) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A022) offered by Mr. Hice (GA).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Hice (GA) amendment (A022) Failed by voice vote.
